meterread91Aggregator.mainSelect: select * from (select t.dbi_cd_punto || to_char(t.ldall, 'YYYYMMDD') || lmari || lprog as lk, t.dbi_cd_punto, to_char(t.ldall, 'YYYYMMDD') as dtlet, t.ltipo, t.lmari, t.lprog, g.equnrneu, d.matnr, dec_numeratore(d.matnr, lprog, lmari, ltipo), decode(lmari, 'P', round(t.lline, 1), round(t.llet1 * t.lkost)) lettura, dec_tipolettura(e.ableinh, t.ldall), row_number() over(partition by dbi_cd_punto, lmari, lprog order by ldall) ordine from instmgmt_diint i, dbi_user.ifc_sap_letture_ele_anubis t, instmgmt_diger g, devinforec_int d, instln_data e where i.legacy = t.dbi_cd_punto and i.legacy = g.legacy and g.equnrneu = d.legacy and dbi_cd_punto = e.vstelle and e.vstelle in (select cncon from z_pr_in_lavorazione) and t.ldall > to_date(i.eadat, 'YYYYMMDD') and ldall is not null) where ordine > 1 order by dbi_cd_punto, dtlet, ordine, lmari, lprog

meterreadExtractor.mainSelect: select * from meterread2_ieablu order by legacy
